They said we dont use our breasts for any lifting they just sit there. Wel Fidays are the busiest day of the week fro us Fish Day, and the waitresses to everything , including coffee , orders, taking meals out , dishes, putting away stacks of dishes. I cant imagine going back that quick . Iam afraid I would rip something open. That an dthey said I would not be in any pain and only need OTC Motrin, which is fine but I dont know how my body is going to react to this.
